Lol, the prices weren’t messed up, you just added another useless class into the base.
Mine work just fine.
[/quote]

Hey, any idea how i can change items price without using cache cus tha gy bassil ddint say where to put that code in Buttonhandler.java so 100% will got errors

Add me Skype: Evil.Wrecked[/quote]
Rofl its self-explanatory where to put it just read it closely…

item.title: 718 Matrix source SHOP PRICES FIX - Edit prices without using cache
item.dc:creator: @bassil bassil
item.description:
@bassil wrote:

Hello everyone, I coded a fix to the prices on all matrix 718 sources, basically the problem was that you couldn’t edit prices on the server, you had to do so through the cache, Well, I coded a prices.java, shops.java, and Buttonhandler.java fix.
I coded all of the prices.java and this, and I give NO ONE permission to release this unless you get permission from me and I reply with a “yes”.
This tutorial will be useless to those who cannot code because I ain’t helping you integrate it into the server, im just giving you the codes.

FILES (Prices.java & Shop.java):
http://up.ht/QcaFmr

}[/code]
Buttonhandler.java code - - - >if (componentId == 20) { player.getTemporaryAttributtes().put("ShopSelectedSlot", slotId); if (packetId == WorldPacketsDecoder.ACTION_BUTTON1_PACKET) shop.sendInfo(player, slotId, isBuying ? shop.getMainStock() : player.getInventory().getItems().getItems()); else if (packetId == WorldPacketsDecoder.ACTION_BUTTON2_PACKET) shop.handleShop(player, slotId, 1); else if (packetId == WorldPacketsDecoder.ACTION_BUTTON3_PACKET) shop.handleShop(player, slotId, 5); else if (packetId == WorldPacketsDecoder.ACTION_BUTTON4_PACKET) shop.handleShop(player, slotId, 10); else if (packetId == WorldPacketsDecoder.ACTION_BUTTON5_PACKET) shop.handleShop(player, slotId, 50); else if (packetId == WorldPacketsDecoder.ACTION_BUTTON9_PACKET) shop.handleShop(player, slotId, 500); else if (packetId == WorldPacketsDecoder.ACTION_BUTTON8_PACKET) shop.sendExamine(player, slotId);

Read full topic
item.source: 718 Matrix source SHOP PRICES FIX - Edit prices without using cache
